name: lark_docs_extract_content
description: Extract content from Lark Docs (Feishu) documents including text, tables, and structure

maxBlocks.description: Maximum number of content blocks to extract

waitForLoad.description: Time to wait for document to load (ms)

toolInfo.emb: Lark Docs document content extraction tool for collaborative documents
toolInfo.thought: Manually copying content from Lark Docs loses document structure and collaborative elements. This tool extracts structured content including tables, comments, and formatting in one operation.
